member.name: EMRALPHABLEND
member.summary: The EMRALPHABLEND structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.xDest
member.summary: The x coordinate, in logical units, of the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.yDest
member.summary: The y coordinate, in logical units, of the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.cxDest
member.summary: Logical width of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.cyDest
member.summary: Logical height of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.xSrc
member.summary: Logical x coordinate of the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.ySrc
member.summary: Logical y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the source rectangle.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.xformSrc
member.summary: World-space to page-space transformation of the source device context.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.crBkColorSrc
member.summary: Background color (the RGB value) of the source device context. To make a COLORREF value, use the macro.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.iUsageSrc
member.summary: Source bitmap information color table usage (DIB_RGB_COLORS).

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.offBitsSrc
member.summary: Offset to the source bitmap bits.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.cbBitsSrc
member.summary: Size of the source bitmap bits.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.cxSrc
member.summary: Width of source rectangle in logical units.

member.name: EMRALPHABLEND.cySrc
member.summary: Height of the source rectangle in logical units.
